attributes.action: Interest Free/Low Interest Loans for Environmental Improvements.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Under this proposal the government would offer interest free loans, similar to student loans, of up to £20,000 for individuals to make environmental improvements to their properties. 

These loans would be available to any project where practical and permanent improvements are being made to a property, such as the installation of pV cells or solar-water heaters, that will show a significant reduction in power usage by the property. 

Loans will be repaid at the market rate of the power saved or in totality when the property is sold. 

This scheme is intended to allow individuals, at no cost to themselves, and little to the taxpayer, to make environmental improvements to their property that reduce or negate the need to rely on power purchased from the national grid hence :

Reducing carbon emissions through the use of renewable energies.
Reducing power generation. 
Decentralising power production.
